features: Sculpted fit with trim, tailored mummy patterning is designed for optimal thermal efficiency and packability
Premium 800 FP down is ultra-packable, hydrophobic, PFC-free, and 100% Responsible Down Standard(RDS)Certified for traceability throughout the supply chain
Closely articulated hood with internal draft collar and draft tube for weight and warmth efficiency
Opposite-sided zippers allow men’s(left side zip)and women’s(right side zip)models to be zipped together to create a double sleeping bag
Thermo Gills™ zipper vents extend the temperature range of your sleeping bag on milder nights without letting cold drafts in
Waterproof, breathable hood and footbox materials protect you from tent wall condensation, keeping you warm and dry though the night
Fabric set of 20D Nylon Ripstop DWR shell, ultra-plush 30D Nylon Taffeta lining, and 40D Nylon Ripstop Osmo™ DWR footbox for a supreme sleep experience
Premium down insulation is hydrophobically treated with for waterproof security on the trail
Full-length Ykk zipper with snagless baffle construction and draft tube seals warm air in
Protected by the Nemo Lifetime Warranty
